title: ESG & Sustainability
description: This section introduces the core concepts of Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) principles and sustainability. It helps MSMEs understand how responsible practices can enhance long-term business value, align with global standards, and support Malaysia's sustainable development agenda.

title: Website & Platform
description: Discover essential websites and digital platforms that provide tools, resources, and guidance for ESG implementation, sustainability reporting, and climate risk management.

title: Resources
description: Access key policy documents, frameworks, and guidelines from Malaysian government agencies and international organizations that shape ESG practices and sustainability standards.

title: Certification
description: Explore certification programs and standards that help MSMEs demonstrate their commitment to environmental, social, and governance excellence through recognized credentials.

title: Financing & Incentives
description: Learn about financial facilities, grants, and incentive programs available to support MSMEs in adopting sustainable practices, green technologies, and ESG initiatives.

title: ESG Champion
description: Discover success stories, best practices, and leadership examples from organizations that have excelled in ESG implementation and sustainability transformation.
